a | Size  150 mm NB

product_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: cs(carbon steel), standard: API 600, class: 150, feature: matching flanges complete with nuts & bolts

product_entries.full_product_description:
Supply, erection and testing of  heavy grade(class-C) pipes  of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS-1239 including all fittings viz. tees, elbows, reducers, union,  flanges, rubber gaskets,  GI  nuts  bolts,  washer and structural steels for pipe supports. Hanger support with anchor fasteners and clamps shall be supplied to fix the pipes on ceiling wall etc. including supporting/fixing the pipe on floor / wall /ceiling with clamps,   hangers (using anchor fastners) as per specification. Cutting of floors, walls etc and making it good after erection of pipes shall be of vendor's scope. Necessary painting with 2 coats of primer and 2 coats of synthetic enamel paints to be done and supply of paints shall be with vendor's scope.
a | 50 NB
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: grade: class-C, thickness: 5.4mm, standard: IS-1239, fittings: tees, elbows, reducers, union, flanges, rubber gaskets, GI nuts bolts, washer, structural steels for pipe supports, support: hanger support with anchor fasteners and clamps, feature: supporting/fixing the pipe on floor / wall /ceiling with clamps, hangers (using anchor fastners), feature: cutting of floors, walls etc and making it good after erection, painting: 2 coats of primer and 2 coats of synthetic enamel paints, supply of paints: vendor's scope

Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be grooved with groove coupling. All related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope.
